definition: superficially attractive and stylish, a photograph that is printed on smooth shiny paper
details:
adjective
- superficially attractive and stylish
= synonyms: showy
- reflecting light
= synonyms: glistening, lustrous, sheeny, shiny, shining
- of paper and fabric and leather, having a surface made smooth and shiny especially by pressing between rollers
= example: of paper and fabric and leather, having a surface made smooth and shiny especially by pressing between rollers
= synonyms: calendered
noun
- a photograph that is printed on smooth shiny paper
- a magazine printed on good quality paper
= synonyms: slick
